title: Spot a Meteor Shower
description: Go outside at night and try to spot a meteor. Share your experience or a photo if you catch one!

title: Ask 3 Space Questions
description: Write down three questions you have about space. Try to find the answers using Cosmos Explorer!

title: Build a Paper Rocket
description: Create a paper rocket and see how far you can launch it. Take a photo or video of your launch!
